translations.translation: So if you have a ploy, use it against Me now!'
So if you have any plot to devise against Me, then devise it.
So if you have any ploy, try it against Me!
If you have any plans, use them.
If you now have any conspiracy, carry it out on Me.
So, if you have a plot, use it against Me (Allah)!
So if you have a plan, plan against Me (now).
if you have a trick, try you now to trick Me!'
If now ye have any wit, outwit Me.
If now you have any strategy, use it against Me.
If now ye have any craft, try that craft upon Me.
If you have any stratagems [left], try them out against Me!’
Now, if ye have a trick (or plot), use it against Me!
So if you have a plot, use it against Me (Allah)!
If you are cunning, then try your cunning against Me!
So if you have a strategy, use it against Me.
So if you have a plan, then plan against Me.
[77:39] So if you have any stratagems, any ploy to ward off your chastisement, try your strategems against Me!’ — put them into effect!
(If now ye have any wit) if you have the power to do anything to Me, (outwit Me) then do it; it is also said that this means: if you have any scheme against Me, then execute it.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { فَإِن كَانَ لَكمُ } أيها المكلَّفون { كَيْدٌ } ومكر تقاومون به معي، وتدفعون به عنكم عذابي { فَكِيدُونِ } [المرسلات: 39] وامكروني إن استطعتم
